frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrC: annual climatology computed from annual mean samples
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

grid_label.gn: data reported on a model's native grid
grid_label.gna: data reported on a native grid in the region of Antarctica
grid_label.gng: data reported on a native grid in the region of Greenland

ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.comment: Prepared using CMIP5 model ACCESS1-3 as input. A combination of historical and rcp85 datasets were used to create this ISMIP6 forcing dataset
ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.institution: NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Greenbelt, MD 20771, USA
ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.references: Experimental protocol for sealevel projections from ISMIP6 standalone ice sheet models, Nowicki, S. et al, 2020, https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-2019-322
ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.source: ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0 derived dataset computed from CMIP5 ACCESS1-3 historical and rcp85 simulations for ISMIP6
ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.source_description: Ice sheet relevant datasets produced by the ISMIP6 Team for the standalone ice sheet experiment of ISMIP6
ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0.title: ISMIP6 (CMIP6) - ACCESS1-3-rcp85-1-0 derived data prepared for input4MIPs
